Source file src/github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/examples/payment.go

Documentation: github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/examples 

     1  package main
     2  
     3  import (
     4  	"context"
     5  	"log"
     6  
     7  	"cosmossdk.io/math"
     8  	"github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/client"
     9  	"github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/types"
    10  	gnfdsdktypes "github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield/sdk/types"
    11  )
    12  
    13  // it is the example of payment SDKs usage
    14  func main() {
    15  	account, err := types.NewAccountFromPrivateKey("test", privateKey)
    16  	if err != nil {
    17  		log.Fatalf("New account from private key error, %v", err)
    18  	}
    19  	cli, err := client.New(chainId, rpcAddr, client.Option{DefaultAccount: account})
    20  	if err != nil {
    21  		log.Fatalf("unable to new greenfield client, %v", err)
    22  	}
    23  	ctx := context.Background()
    24  	// create a payment account
    25  	txHash, err := cli.CreatePaymentAccount(context.Background(), account.GetAddress().String(), gnfdsdktypes.TxOption{})
    26  	handleErr(err, "CreatePaymentAccount")
    27  	waitForTx, err := cli.WaitForTx(ctx, txHash)
    28  	log.Printf("Wait for tx: %s", waitForTx.String())
    29  
    30  	paymentAccounts, err := cli.GetPaymentAccountsByOwner(ctx, account.GetAddress().String())
    31  
    32  	// deposit
    33  	paymentAddr := paymentAccounts[len(paymentAccounts)-1].Addr
    34  	depositAmount := math.NewIntFromUint64(100)
    35  	depositTxHash, err := cli.Deposit(ctx, paymentAddr, depositAmount, gnfdsdktypes.TxOption{})
    36  	handleErr(err, "Deposit")
    37  	waitForTx, err = cli.WaitForTx(ctx, txHash)
    38  	log.Printf("Wait for tx: %s", waitForTx.String())
    39  	log.Printf("deposited %s to payment account %s, txHash=%s", depositAmount.String(), paymentAddr, depositTxHash)
    40  
    41  	// get stream record
    42  	streamRecord, err := cli.GetStreamRecord(ctx, paymentAddr)
    43  	handleErr(err, "GetStreamRecord")
    44  	log.Printf("stream record has balance %s", streamRecord.StaticBalance)
    45  
    46  	// withdraw
    47  	withdrawAmount := math.NewIntFromUint64(50)
    48  	withdrawTxHash, err := cli.Withdraw(ctx, paymentAddr, withdrawAmount, gnfdsdktypes.TxOption{})
    49  	handleErr(err, "Withdraw")
    50  	log.Printf("withdraw tx: %s", withdrawTxHash)
    51  
    52  	waitForTx, err = cli.WaitForTx(ctx, txHash)
    53  	log.Printf("Wait for tx: %s", waitForTx.String())
    54  
    55  	streamRecordAfterWithdraw, err := cli.GetStreamRecord(ctx, paymentAddr)
    56  	handleErr(err, "GetStreamRecord")
    57  	log.Printf("stream record has balance %s", streamRecordAfterWithdraw.StaticBalance)
    58  }
    59  

Build version go1.19.10.
